hotels.title: Mornington Peninsula Heritage Glamour with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: The spoils of Victoria's Mornington Peninsula await when you stay at InterContinental Sorrento Mornington Peninsula, an IHG Hotel. From some of the country's most esteemed wineries to its world-famous beaches and award-winning eateries, a trip to this sunny slice of coastline is a must. The hotel enjoys a marvellous location and treats its guests to seven restaurants and bars, the blissful Aurora Spa & Bathhouse and a swimming pool for those days when you just want to flop and drop.
